tone.name: Tone
tone.description: The tone to emit when turning the siren on. When `available_tones` property is a map, either the key or the value can be used. Must be supported by the integration.

volume_level.name: Volume
volume_level.description: The volume level of the noise to emit when turning the siren on. Must be supported by the integration.

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: The duration in seconds of the noise to emit when turning the siren on. Must be supported by the integration.
